title: Pentagram - Curious Volume (2015) ak
description:
Legendary heavy metal band and pioneers of the doom metal genre Pentagram have announced that they will be releasing their new studio album Curious Volume on August 28th via Peaceville Records. It is the first new album since 2011Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Last Rites.

Featuring 11 classic heavy metal compositions with catchy hooks from core band members Victor Griffin, Greg Turley and Bobby Liebling (Pete Campbell on the drums completes the band's lineup), "Curious Volume" was recorded with Swedish producer Mattias Nilsson at studios located in Maryland and Virginia. Additional recording took place in Tennessee with Grammy Award-winning producer Travis Wyrick, who also helmed PENTAGRAM's previous album, "Last Rites". The album's cover artwork was provided courtesy of Richard Schouten.

"Curious Volume" track listing:
mp3
transcode


01. Lay Down And Die
02. The Tempter Push
03. Dead Bury Dead
04. Earth Flight
05. Walk Alone
06. Curious Volume
07. Misunderstood
08. Close The Casket
09. Sufferin'
10. Devil's Playground
11. Because I Made It


To support the new album, the band has tours planned in North America and Europe throughout 2015 and 2016. 

Now,if you like the music go to the shows and buy the merch,Want the CD buy it from the bands webpage (NOT wal-mart) that money goes to the artists not to anyone else
